text: I have only ever used the drive thru. My experience there varies. At times, I feel valued and am cheerily greeted by an employee who seems to genuinely care and enjoy their job. Other times, I am not greeted at all for several minutes while the employee types away on their computer (more than one of the employees do this). It’s not hard to quickly pick up the drive thru line and say “Welcome, I’ll be with you in just a moment” and carry on. As a customer, it does not leave a good impression when you are neglected. Typically the wait time is incredibly long, even if my prescription is filled and ready to go. I will continue to use this Walgreens because my insurance switched its contract from CVS and it is the closest location to me. But I will advise my friends and family against going here. The employees here need reinforced training on customer interaction.

text: The best place around for hair color,  cut,  style,  perms and Brazilian blowouts.  Large selection of Paul Mitchell products and other products.

name: Linda Marshall
text: I was desperate for a color correction and overall hair makeover. After checking out their reviews, I chose Kreative Kuts. I am happy to say that my experience was absolutely wonderful!!' Kim took sincere time with me to choose a color, style and introduced me to several new things that I had not heard of. I decided to do the Brazilian blowout at the time of my color and cut. She patiently and joyfully worked on my LONG hair for hours even staying late to give me the most amazing hair I've had!!  She never rushed or cut any corners to hurry, she continued to take time and make certain that everything was done correctly. I am so excited to have a new do and a new hair stylist. She is definitely a color specialist and the entire staff was very professional, qualified, talented as well as friendly. They can do eyelash perms, Brazilian blowout, and sell all the fine Paul Mitchell products, not to mention, new and interesting tools. I give them a 10 plus!!! Oh and the other great part was the price, they were so reasonable for the services they perform and their main goal is to make sure you are completely satisfied when you leave!! Thank you Kim and P.J and I will see you again in August!!!!

name: Jamie Perry
text: My whole family goes to Creative Kuts & Styles Hair Salon and Beauty Shop. My Mum and I love that the hairdressers go to the Nashville and other hair shows to learn how to do the latest cuts, colors and styles (my Dad and brother don't care as much - they just get the same men's barber hair cut each time). I worked at a beauty parlor years ago and I can tell you that I've never seen hair stylists or beauticians that care as much as Kim and her team. I have very long hair that I dread cutting but the girls take off only what is necessary. I alternate between hair straightening and letting the  hairdressing salon tame it all perfectly into loose wavy curls. Every six weeks I like to get a deep conditioning keratin treatment and multidimensional highlights and Kim is the best at listening to and giving me exactly what I want. I love that I can buy all of my fav Paul Mitchell, A.R.C.O.N and Olez hair and beauty supplies here too. For Mothers Day, I treated my Mom to some corrective hair coloring (these guys are master colorists) and a new textured bob that she absolutely adores and a relaxing pedicure too. We have booked them to do all the hair updos for my bridal party in mid-June. I've seen some of their wedding hairstyles on instagram and am so excited.

name: Bryn Ealy
text: As a medical professional, I can say that I’ve never had another medical colleague speak to me so condescendingly over the phone. My patient was out of state on vacation and unfortunately was having severe pain in a tooth we had recently done a root canal on. I sent prescriptions for an antibiotic and pain medication for the patient. The patient called me after hours stating that the pharmacy wouldn’t allow her to have the narcotic and that I needed to call them myself to verify the prescription. When I spoke with the pharmacist on staff, she berated me for trying to transfer a controlled substance from another Walgreens. I questioned if her e-prescribe was comparable with my dental software, and she basically told me to kick rocks. The prescription ended up going through, but from the sounds of it, she was also very rude to my patient. For someone whose job is literally to help patients obtain medication in order to feel better, this pharmacist clearly had no interest.  Disappointed in the care given to someone clearly in pain and not drug-seeking. My patient is not the first person in the world to have ever had a toothache while away from their regular dentist. She won’t be the last.

Absolutely useless customer service.

text: Wish there were less stars.  Don't know what to think of a store which will accept a call, tell caller there are 2 calls in advance of you, then one 1 call in advance of you, then keep you on hold for 25 minutes, 26 seconds, and HANG UP ON YOU.  Trying to find out about a prescription that I was to have available at noon today, it now being nearly 7:00 pm.

name: Christopher Williams
text:
Worst pharmacist and customer service I have ever dealt with. My wife had surgery and we dropped off 5 prescription slips at around  1645 We were told it would be ready at 1830.

We went to the store at 1830 we were told that they had not been filled any of the prescription and to have a seat, 30 min later they said there was an issue with one of medications and they would have to call the doctor in order to fill the pain medication. I provided them the doctor number which they didn't call, I left the store and got ahold of the doctor who inturn called the store. After talking with the store he then called back at 2032 and said that everything was straightened out and that they would fill the prescription. Went back to the store at at 2103 they had asked if we could come back in 15 min that they just got off the phone with the Doctor (which was a false statement they had gotten off the phone around 30 to 40 min prior). Finally got the pain prescription around 2133. The surgery was over at 1200 and was able to take first pain meds at 2140. Every interaction I had with them they acted as if did not care. When I asked questions they seems extremely bothered and annoyed that I would even inquire on what the issue was. I just hope that another consumer doesn't have to go through what we went through.

I would STRONGLY recommend not using this walgreens to get a prescription filled especially if you are counting on them for customer service (a caring attitude and a quick filling of a prescription). It is truly just the employees that work in the pharmacy.(I was not the only person that was struggling with getting medication, I witnessed two our families having issues as well).

To be fair the rest of the store clerks I worked with were extremely helpful and polite. I normally don't make comments but it was so bad I really hope nobody else has to go through this type of treatment.

name: Christina Clayton
text: Every single time I am in here it takes entirely too long. The staff either needs to be trained to be more productive in a faster time or they need more employees on hand. Either way, having to wait in line for over 20 minutes is absurd. Not to mention we already tried to come earlier in the day and left because the line was so backed up then too.

text: Love this place! Every team member does exceptional work and truly cares about customers.

I called Walgreens to transfer the prescription and see if they could get the item for me. Jacob was very nice, helpful, and kept me informed. He got everything transferred quickly, was able to locate the item, and it even came in the next day.

text: Switched to this pharmacy to keep from having to go to the one I normally go to in Eufaula, they are very helpful when you have questions, great customer service and open 24 hrs and they will let you know when busy times are so you don't have to wait, unlike Eufaula pharmacy you wait every time, I will do the drive to get the professional service

name: Angelica Leadabrand
text: I'm giving this Walgreen's location five stars because of the extremely helpful & courtous employees.  I go to this Walgreen's 1-3 times per week when I just need to "pick up a few things" & don't want to deal with the hassle of a big store.  I cannot recall a time when I have not been greeted by an employee as I enter the front door.  Employees always ask if I need assistance when they notice me looking around for something.  Not only will they walk with me to the item's location, but they will assist me to the cosmetics counter where they will ring up my items without me having to wait in line at the main register.  That being said, it is obvious that whoever manages this store puts customer satisfaction first & does an excellent job at instilling that belief in their employees.

name: Mrs Cricket
text:
I started at the drive thru and after waiting in line I find out there was an insurance problem. The gentleman working the drive thru didn't know what the details were so I went inside and stood in line to figure out the problem. After clearing things up with the insurance, I then had to wait for the prescription. They called out my name but then I had to wait in line again. Finally at checkout when they needed my id that it is naturally in the car. At this point I'm just done; I leave. 3 hours and no prescription. Yes I could have gotten my id and waiting again but I chose not to. They were under staffed and it was now peak time.

The prescription was dropped off and given a pickup time. It wasn't ready. I believe because of the insurance problem but I'm guessing because it was never said. A simple phone call could have helped this situation.

name: ryan 1981
text: It's hard to believe the positive reviews. They called our elderly family member who can't do for her self anymore. She can't talk like she used to so we have power of attorney. Walgreens has had no trouble in telling about her medicine for the past year now. Now all a sudden they refuse to talk to us about her medicine saying it violates her hippa privacy when they have been talking to us for over a year. They are just harassing us and throwing us around. This walgreens has bad customer service.

Had they answered the phone this wouldn't be an issue. text: Great salon and staff! My hair looks better than it ever has. Michele is very knowledgeable about all the products and was able to help me get the perfect stuff for my hair. This was the first time I’ve ever had a thorough consultation and I loved how Michele took her time with me, making sure my hair was perfect. I waited a week before posting this to make sure my color lasted. Usually it washes out after a shampoo or two but my color still looks amazing! I will definitely be back!

resp.text: Lexi thank you so much! We love that you are happy with your hair and products! We enjoyed your visit as well and look forward to seeing you again soon!!

name: Lauren King
text: Everything was perfect! I am new to the area and was referred to come here after another local salon messed my hair up! Not only did they fix my mess, they gave me exactly what I wanted! I was able to relax with a glass of wine, and totally enjoyed my time here with all the girls here and other customers! Everyone was so friendly and made me feel very welcomed and comfortable! My hair is in the best condition that it’s ever been. I have never been shown how to take care of my hair like this before to where I actually understand what I’m doing! I can’t wait to come back and want everyone to know to come here! Best Salon ever!

resp.text: Lauren thank you so much! We are happy you love your hair now and that you enjoyed your time with us! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Amanda Barnes
text: Very clean salon! The staff cleans each chair and station before, during, and after each customer. My stylist took her time to listen to me and what I wanted. For the first time I didn’t feel like I was being rushed through to quick get me out of there so they could move on to the next one. I was even told I was welcome to hang out and finish my wine after they were through! My cut and color are perfect and I didn’t know that my toner wasn’t supposed to be put on wet hair at the shampoo bowl. No wonder my color has always faded! It has been over a week now since I came here and wanted to wait to leave a review to see if what they told me about this was true. My hair looks just like I got it done! It’s soft and shiny and I can see that it’s going to last longer than it ever has. The color looks better and my hair doesn’t look dry and dull like it usually does. I purchased the products they recommended and they really work! I am looking forward to coming back here! Great salon, extremely clean and staff is awesome!

resp.text:
Ananda,

Thank you so much for noticing how hard our team works to provide a safe, clean, and friendly environment. It was a pleasure to meet you, we are happy you love your hair, and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Stevie Bowden
text: I Love This Salon! All of the ladies here were so friendly, helpful, and I loved to see how well they all work together! My hair extensions look amazing and I learned so much about my hair! Michele taught me how to take care of my hair, explained everything that she was doing, and why she was doing it, plus I even went home with all the products that I need to maintain my hair! My color is perfect and matches my extensions exactly! You can’t even tell I’m wearing them, it looks like my own hair!  I will never go anywhere else and I highly recommend MB Salon to anyone who is looking for the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much Stevie! We are so happy you love your hair and appreciate you! It was a pleasure to meet you and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Cara Brown
text: Michele is amazing! She has helped me finally get the haircut I have wanted for years. I have had a very short pixie cut for 25 years and didn’t think I could ever grow it out. I love the way she listens to what you want and easily explains the steps she is doing to get it that way. The other young ladies that also work with Michele are very nice and helpful as well.

resp.text:
Cara,

Thank you so much, we truly appreciate you! I enjoy every visit with you and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: LORI MANAK
text: Lisa D is a ROCK Star at color and cut! She’s fast but SO efficient with foils and highlights! I’d follow her ANYWHERE!!! Trust me, she is AMAZING!!!

resp.text: Lori Thank you so much! We are very excited to have Lisa as a part of our team! We all truly appreciate you and look forward to seeing yo-you again soon!

name: Amber Carlisle
text: They are the best in EVERYTHING hair!! Always so knowledgeable and more than willing to help in any way!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amber! We are so happy you found us, and that we were able to help you. We are looking forward to seeing you again, and to see the amazing progress with your hair!

name: Kunya J
text: I thought I was going to have to go to Atlanta for the beautifully toned balayage hair color I wanted. Michele walked me through each step and explained the outcome along the way. My hair turned out beautifully.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kunya! It was a pleasure to meet you. You look amazing and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Bailey Randolph
text: Michelle is an absolute miracle worker! She turned my hair from SMURF BLUE (she did not do this) to a beautiful silver blue. She has made my hair healthy over the past few months and I could not be happier. Today I just had my hair dyed a platinum blonde and I've got to say she really makes my dreams come true! She is professional, honest about her services/products, and will make sure you're comfortable and feel like you're right at home. I cannot say enough about this women's abilities and wonderful personality

resp.text: Thank you so much Bailey! It has been an absolute pleasure! I am so happy that we have turned around your experience on hair color! You look amazing and we look forward to seeing you again soon!!

name: Faith McDonald-Colburn
text: Michele is top notch in the hair care industry. She takes the time to find out what the client wants, expects and delivers in all categories. The atmosphere at MB Salon is professional yet laid back. The experience while getting my hair done is the best. I highly recommend MB Salon to anyone who wants a top notch stylist who cares about her clients as well as making them feel their best when they walk out the door!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Faith! We love that you enjoy your experience here and truly appreciate you! Looking forward to seeing you soon!

name: Sarah Smith
text: Looking for a professional comfortable environment this isn’t it. When I first made my appointment I was excited. I read all the reviews and everything lead me to believe that this would be where I would find my new stylist since I’m new to the area. Boy was I wrong!!!! The lady that did my hair was really nice and listened to what I had to say but the other lady was very pushy when it came to my color. She kept suggesting things that would be more time consuming for me. I’m a very simple person and do not spend a lot of time on my hair. It also seemed this small salon has a lot of drama as one lady kept talking about previous employees and issues she was having with them along with a new salon being built. I was lead to belibthat she had some past issues with that salon. If it had not been for that I feel like I would have been very pleased with my service. My cut and color was nice but I felt uncomfortable with conversations that was going on around me.

resp.text:
Sarah,

We are very sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience in the salon you were at. We keep extremely accurate records of all guests that visit our salon for services, or even just walk in to purchase products. We do not have, nor have we ever serviced a Sarah Smith in our business. You definitely have the wrong salon, and your experience is clearly not a type of atmosphere that is at MB Salon, and all of our reviews support this. Please remove your review and we wish you the best in finding the correct salon. Should you ever want to have a real visit to our salon we would love to have you. Thank you!

name: Carol Lloyd
text: Michele is not only the best at everything hair related, she is also a friend. She took me from colored dark brown hair to my natural pearly gray color. She did it in stages so that my hair is healthier and stronger than it has ever been. I am beyond thankful for her.

resp.text: Thank you so much Miss Carol!! I value your friendship and enjoy every visit with you! Oh what a journey it has been!

name: Tawnya Yates
text: Michele is simply amazing. I went to her with a vague idea of what I wanted, and she transformed my hair into the perfect purple I had pictured in my head. She really took her time and made me feel like I was a VIP. She was incredibly informative and able to answer the 1,267 questions I had. Bonus points for serving me a glass of wine! I'm so glad I found her salon,  and I'll definitely be back to see her!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming!! We never mind questions..... we welcome them! We value you and look forward to seeing you again soon!!!

text: Michele is an absolute miracle worker. I love her and how much time and quality care she put into my hair. I have never in my entire life had a better experience at a salon than this. My hair has never looked this good!!! I can’t stop staring at myself in the mirror because my hair is now so shiny and beautiful. I also received the best hair cut I’ve ever had in my life. My hair looks so much thicker and perfect. Go see Michele ASAP, you’ll never want to get your hair done by anyone else ever again!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! I’m happy you love your hair! Good luck with everything! Don’t forget to visit!!!

text: Michelle is an incredible stylist with so much knowledge . I have been to many high end salons in the Birmingham are and after having parts of my hair fried off,  Michelle has taken her time with me and my color. She also incorporates a lot of treatments and exactly what I need at home to keep my hair more healthy and strong for our next visit . I feel Michelle is more like family to me than a stylist . I won’t let anyone else touch my hair again after finding her !!!

resp.text: Thank you Khushboo! You are always a pleasure to spend time with! I’m so happy you love your hair, and look forward to seeing you again!

text: Michele is the most patient and knowledgeable hair professional that I have been to! She genuinely listens to what you want, and her top priority is the health of your hair. text: Amazing! Best experience I’ve ever had! Michele took the time to really get to know me, my hair, and to explain everything she was doing, how to use each product, and exactly how to style my hair! My color has never looked this good, and my cut is perfect! I love the salon and Michele!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I enjoyed our time together! I’m so happy you love your hair!! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

text: Michele is wonderful, within a second of walking into her salon I had a full glass of wine :) very friendly and awesome customer service ❤

text: Michele is exceptional!!  My hair has never looked better!  She offers vast knowledge of style, color, and products. text: I highly recommend anyone to Michele.  I relocated to Birmingham a few years ago and after some trial and error with other salons/stylists I found her and haven't been happier.  I bring her color ideas all the time and she nails it! If she can't do it in one appointment, she sets that expectation before you decide.  Great cut and color without breaking the bank and my hair, though it goes through some intense coloring and daily heat styling, has never been healthier thanks to her!

text: She is so good with my curly hair I had to follow her from New York! She knows exactly what to do and her suggestions are far better than what I could ever come up with. I trust her completely and am never disappointed. The new place is perfect!

text: I met Michele 1 nite coming outta Red Lobster, I LOVED her hair she LOVED mine  gave me her business card... The rest is history!! She now cuts all our hair in my family. Excellent products & we love our hair!! Michele is like FAMILY  💕

resp.text: Red lobster was our destiny! LOL I absolutely love you and your entire family I’m so happy that I was at red lobster that night. Thank you so much!

name: Leslie Houser
text: Michelle is the best hair dresser I’ve ever been to. I’m 36 and have thick, course, and long hair. I always thought the type of  pigment of my hair would never go past orange when going to a lighter color. Not only did Michelle get my hair to a georgeous medium blonde with no orange. She fixed the huge mess the past hair stylist had done to my hair. There was a line where the previous salon had not blended or taken their time. Michelle took her time and made sure it was done right. I’m so happy that I went to her! I told her she is like the doctors on botched for hair!! I know you will be as pleased as I am if you choose to have your hair done by her. I’ve been to many stylist. She is by far the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We still have to do a little more work to get your color perfect, but like you said, your hair type takes a little more time. It was fun spending time with you, and little “Mike” lol.

text: The best stylist I've ever had! My hair has never looked better. Michele is super professional and has a lot of experience in this industry. 10/10 recommend!

name: laura risse
text: If you are like me, and are very picky/nervous about going to see a new hairstylist/colorist; do not hesitate to come see Michele! I PROMISE YOU WILL NOT WANT TO GO ANYWHERE ELSE. I was looking for a new hairstylist/colorist once I moved back to Birmingham about 2 years ago, and will NOT let anyone else touch my hair now. I normally get a blonde balayage which holds for many months and doesn’t grow out brassy like others I have had in the past (it actually always blends perfectly!) Not only does Michele take her time while doing your hair, but she also is very knowledgeable about products and matching the perfect color for your needs. She genuinely cares about you as the client, pays attention to tiny details, and will not let you leave if you are not 100% satisfied. I seriously cannot say enough good things about Michele!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I am so happy you found me, and I love our visits together! I appreciate how patient you are, so that we can get your color perfect every time! I am truly thankful for you!

name: CIERRA YONGUE
text: Michele really cares about your hair!. Mine was severely damaged from years of bad "salon" trips. Not only did she get me to where i wanted to be but she did it so that my hair is healthier than it has been in many years. 5 stars is simply not enough.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We’ve definitely had a journey with your hair! It is an amazing difference from how I met you, to where you are today! I can’t take all the credit though...... you’ve really done your part by taking great care of your hair at home! I appreciate you more than you know!

name: Olcay Ciftci
text: Shopping at Walgreens is like playing a gamble. You find a good deal and clip the coupon. Then, you see the item is available at the nearest store. You order it and wait for pick up, but then you get an email which shows the item is not available at the store. You want to purchase the same item from another Walgreens store or online, but you realize the system assumes you used the coupon and doesn't offer the same coupon. I had this issue several times. Once, one of my orders was canceled because of the same reason, but I saw the product at the shelf in the same day. Walgreens's online system has a lot of problems. Waste of time!

name: Nathan Floyd
text: TOTALLY Agree about just kids working there and being jerks.  I came in at 11:55pm, not because I wanted to, but because I was having an allergic reaction to some medication and needed benadryl. I mistakenly thought they were open 24 hours. Some young blond manager jerk caught me coming in the door and said, "Just so you know, we close in 5 minutes. I mean, I guess you can come in if you need something but you need to leave quickly."  Then, he proceeded to follow me around the store about 15 feet away; not to help find what I needed, but to either act like I was going to steal or rush me out. He followed me all the way back to the register and sat there sighing until I could leave. I will literally never give that Walgreens another penny.

name: Isabel Aleman
text: Avoid this Walgreens!!! The employees were so rude when I asked a simple question about printing pictures. I first asked the woman working the register at the photo center and she was short with me and got the manager. The manager came back and was snarky from the start and when I asked my question again about printing photos she did not attempt to help me and was being rude without cause. We are never coming back to this Walgreens again.

name: Grace Nolen
text: This pharmacy at this Walgreens has the worst service I’ve ever experienced. Not only are they excruciatingly slow, but they have literally given me the wrong medicines that belonged to someone else. They have told me on several occasions that my medicine was not in yet, but when I say “my doctor said she sent it in” they respond with “oh yeah here it is”. Not sure how that makes sense. The staff is also rude. One time I was talking in the drive through and she just hung up the phone and walked away. So I proceeded to go inside and speak to the pharmacist. If I could describe this Walgreens with two words they would be careless and negligent.

name: Jennifer McDonald
text: You make an appointment for vaccine and they let people who do not have an appointment jump ahead of you.   35 mins past appointment time and no help.

name: Austin
text: Worst Walgreens in town, one of the female manager is rude and useless. AVOID this Walgreens.

name: Cole Headley
text: Customer service was great, I felt welcomed as soon as I walked in the door. The cashier ally helped me find everything I was looking for and got my photos ready for me very quickly.

name: Cody Krauel
text: Great pharmacy! Got my prescription ready for me on the way from the doctor, and helped me find some over the counter medicine. Thank you for the great customer service.

name: Shelley Jones
text: The people in the pharmacy were super helpful and very nice. I am definitely filling all of my prescriptions there from now on. They did their best to save me money and even applied a discount card for me that I didn't have. They treat you like a person instead of just a number. I would highly recommend them to everyone.

name: N S
text: I have never seen a pharmacy tech treat a customer so poorly. The pharmacist did not bother to turn around and address the tech’s behavior and after “helping” me the tech turned around to another tech and made fun of me in clear line of site. There is no reason anyone working in the medical industry should treat a patient/customer with such poor manners and outright disrespect. I will never return to this location and will be working on changing my insurance so that I never have to return to another Walgreens store. (Publix, here I come!) As someone that has worked as a pharmacy tech and is currently in school to become a pharmacist myself I cannot imagine how this behavior could be seen as acceptable and believe that someone in charge should have addressed it as soon as it began. So disappointed in the entire interaction.

name: Katelyn K
text: Everyone in pharmacy is super helpful and friendly. Especially Madison who worked so hard dealing with my insurance company so that I wouldn't have to pay out of pocket. She really saved the day.

text:
i was told i could not receive black tar heroin at this location

text:
READ BOTTOM LINE AT END if you don't want to read this paragraph.

I have had mixed experiences at this store. The STORE part is fine.

The PHARMACY is another story. I have had mixed experiences with them, from some pharmacists being competent and outstanding, to some being downright rude and dumb. I tutored/ taught organic chemistry when I was an undergrad and have had many arguments with them over medication. I have had them get my dosages wrong many times (telling me to take to much). On top of this many times they treated me like I was a criminal for trying to get medicines with no street value. Other times those medicines that did have street value, were handed over to me like candy. Some of the employees also were not aware of basic pharmacy policy, upon which I had to remind them of. Needless to say many of them can be rude when you question there blatant incompetence.

BOTTOM LINE: go during peak hours. Know what and how much to take. Then double check when you get home. Remain calm through the rudeness or plan on taking your business else where.

text: Love them but really wish it didn't take so long to get meds filled. My only complaint

name: chad boone
text: I went in the store to have a prescription filled for some ulcer meds and i do not have insurance. The pharmacist came out and sat down with me to show me the cost of the prescription. It was about $180. She explained to me that I could get the exact same meds over the counter and just double the dose to get the proper strength. She took me to the location of the meds and handed me what I needed...$34! They were extremely busy, but she still took the time to help me make a financially wise decision instead of just selling me something.

name: C Bella
text:
Ashley is my wax specialist at the Birmingham location and she's amazing.  She's been doing my wax for about 5-6 months.  She does a great job and is super friendly and professional.  Highly recommend her and EWC.
I've been a customer of EWC since around 2016/2017 when I moved to the Gulf Coast area and had to find a new wax place since I had previously used a locally owned wax spa in Birmingham.  While living on the Gulf Coast, I patronized the New Orleans, LA, Diberville, MS, and Slidell, LA EWC locations.
The Slidell, LA and Birmingham locations are the best locations of the four I've tried.  I've been getting a full Brazilian bikini wax for 10-11 years now so I know a great wax specialist when I find one...And if you're wondering, yes, I have a wax pass.  Applicable service: Full Brazilian Bikini Wax.

name: Danesha Clarke
text:
I booked a Saturday appointment with European Wax Center on Thursday. In order to travel I need a Covid test which was also booked for Saturday.
I got tested that morning but waiting on the results was going to make the appointment difficult to make. Realizing this, I called to ask if the time could be pushed back; they were booked and said it could not be changed.
We got the results in enough time for me to make the appointment. I called to say that I was on my way and the person on the phone told me the waxer was uncomfortable waxing me.
I let her know that the covid test was a requirement for travel and I had not been in contact with anyone with covid and already received the negative result.

She then said they usually don't come back that quickly, and would have to reschedule.

I understand taking precautions, but I had just recieved a negative result. It's also likely that persons with Covid-19 are actively patronizing their location.
However,  because they were aware that I took the test I was unable to go to my appointment. Very disappointing.

Then as I’m driving from a long distance from where I stay. I received a call saying that the other person we were scheduled with could not do it and if we did come they could try and if she was to do it she could only do one. But overall it’s not guaranteed. So I go into the center to cancel the appointment since I was already in the area to and the receptionist made no eye contact or let me know that everything was canceled. I had to ask her was it completed. She didn’t even say have a good day. She was a black girl with short hair. We stay about 45 minutes away and came together. The appointments was at 2:30 and 3:00. We are first time guest and We will not be coming back.

text:
I got a free wax from the Southern Women's Show from European Wax Center.  I called to make an appointment and was in the same day!  Doug Baker Blvd is definitely all the way down Hwy 280 from where I live in Homewood, however, the clean space I walked into was worth the drive!
The whole place is very streamlined and beautiful.   The products are beautifully displayed on the wall along with descriptions.
The receptionist was a very informative, sweet young lady that even gave me free samples when I showed interest, but did not purchase that day, which I loved!  (Some places feel "pushy" but here, I was very comfortable and left feeling pampered.)
The best part is, if you have never been, you can receive a free wax, and I love 'trying before buying!'
Tell them Corinna sent you!

So it was comfortable and great! I hate waxing myself so Amaryllis will definitely be my new go-to! No more doing acrobatics to try and wax myself!

I’ve been going to this location for over a year (EWC customer in other states since 2012) and I’ve never had a problem. Etoria is my waxer and she’s the best I’ve had. She’s professional, friendly, and makes you feel comfortable.

The waxer I use now is Abbey and she's great!

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Etoria and Abbey. Have a great day!

name: Chasity Pouge
text: I used to rave about this place but lately it has not been the best experience. The turnover is high which is bad enough but they will cancel your appointment at the last minute and then when I came in for my new rescheduled appointment I wasn’t even acknowledged by the receptionists. Yes plural because there was 2.  The usual receptionist knows me by face so I guess I didn’t think nothing of it when those two said nothing to me since they seemed preoccupied...one with another customer and the other took a call on her cell and stepped away. I waited 30 mins to find out that my rescheduled appointment needed to be cancelled because the tech had a family emergency and she left. Walked right pass me!  I finally got to my breaking point and acknowledged the 2 ladies and they had no excuses that made any sense. One of them said she thought I was someone else so I guess we all look alike to her but ok and the other one said with all honesty she simply said you are right we said nothing to you. She was the one who took the call on her cell. Ok so the only wax tech that was still there had I guess turned her wax up and said she could wax me but I needed to give her wax time to cool or I could reschedule again. I opted to wait another 15 mins to let it cool. I must say she was good and this my first time with her but she was actually super nice and I apologized for getting rowdy to her that is just how good she was. As I was leaving the 2 ladies in the front wanted to offer me something for my inconvenience but I got prepaid wax passes so there no credit that could be given so they opted to give me samples which I took cause no one has ever given me samples at this place. It’s sample though so I dunno if that is something spectacular. I asked for a number for management and they said that the manager would have to call me. That’s been a month ago and no call but my $121 pre paid wax pass payment just hit my card again today.  I see that isn’t being rescheduled!  So I said all this to say I might be calling the number and asking for a manager again and getting funds reversed because I can not keep coming to a sinking ship.  Maybe I will do a dispute with my bank and bypass trying to talk to anyone since I never got that call to begin with.

resp.text: Chasity Pouge, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Thanks for bringing this matter to our attention. We would like to get more details about this; please reach out to us at your earliest convenience at  205.637.32.01.

name: Caitlin Carson
text:
DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY! Awkward ...overpriced and unsure of the experience of the technician (this place charges twice the going rate in our area and the service is not half as good as the other places!)

When I arrived the check in process was a little intrusive. The girl at the front desk wanted to see my driver’s license? I’ve been to several spas and had many waxes and never have been asked for a copy of my drivers license. That seems a little extreme for a spa service? But okay. I go to the restroom before my appt starts and when I’m walking back to the waiting area someone calls out my name from a room ..It was my technician (first visit at this place and don’t remember her name)? I felt like that was forward (but not so much so that it ruined the appt). However, then I step into my room and the technician tells me to undress from the waist down that she will do my brows first then my Brazillian ?!? So I don’t have a choice in this and have to lay there EXPOSED while my brows are being done?!? Not only that she didn’t go anywhere! She did not leave the room for me to undress and just stayed in there!?! That’s not typical. Every place I’ve ever been (and I’ve been to many saloons and spas) has always left me in the room to undress then they would come in. More so  than that I’m usually given something to cover up with until the service is needed in that area (unless it’s just a Brazillian that we go straight to). I did not like that!! It was strange and the technician didn’t say a word while she was working which makes things even more awkward!! Oh except for the “shave shaming” as if that’s the reason for the horrible pain that I feel when my hair is being ripped out of my skin around my pubic bone! Lol ?!? So the technician had a dry personality (looking back she seemed weird) ..I had to lay on the table exposed while my brows were getting done first (I didn’t have a choice in that or wasn’t told I did). Also, she stays in the room while I change!!! And when it’s over she stays in the room waiting for me to get dressed!! There was absolutely no concern for privacy or customary respect and boundaries. I much prefer the other place that I go (Marci’s Hoover). The prices are better. The experience isn’t creepy weird or demeaning and my technician is friendly and speaks!

Oh and heads up anyone who gets a brow wax, the technician removed all of my make up then waxed my brows! I told her that I prefer that she just get the strays outside of my make up. My brows are thinning and I have a particular shape that I prefer! That was not respected at all!! There is NO need to remove the make up first of all. (That’s just some personal preference of the technician). That should be the clients choice! We should be able to change without someone watching us when we arrive and before we leave!! There’s no way this place will stay around much longer if things don’t change! Why would anyone continue to pay twice the price for a worse experience!? It’s a strip mall wax place just like Marci’s ..only they advertise like it’s some type of luxury saloon. It’s not..thank goodness they didn’t try to sell me products or some membership. I hate it when I’m paying for a service and still being subjected to high pressure sales. So that is a bonus. To add to the bad experience my wax took close to 30 minutes! It’s never taken that long anywhere else. I don’t think the technician was very experienced. I also felt it was a little creepy that she didn’t say much at all but that she just stays in the room while I’m changing out and back into my clothes. When I was leaving I felt rushed, she was standing with her hand in the door watching me put my shoes on!! I felt rushed cuz her next appt was there! I mean give a a girl some space!

To the management: you need to take note of the things I’ve said. The only people  who wouldn’t be bothered by those things likely don’t know any better and probably haven’t been to other saloons.

resp.text: Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 637-3201. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Keri McDonald
text: Best wax ever. I’ve been going for awhile now. Ask for Lindsey she is the best. Very informative, quick, efficient, and really sweet.

text: Friendly staff from the moment I walked in. Adrian was my waxer and was so good at her job and quick. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Hi Staci, thank you so much for your positive comments about European Wax Center! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Minjee Kim
text: It was my first waxing and Eetoria made everything so comforting and easy! She explained everything fully and the waxing itself was not bad at all. I will definitely come to this place next time.

name: Alicia Hayes
text: Loved the ladies there... Super friendly and didn't make me feel akward for my first time! Will be back soon!!!

resp.text: Alicia Hayes, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at European Wax Center! We hope to see you soon!

name: Liz Love
text: I love going to this place! The reception ladies are always super nice! And Lindsey is hands down the best waxer!! She’s super friendly, incredibly knowledgeable, and she always makes you feel comfortable!! Great job guys!

name: Jora_Fjord
text: As a newbie of the waxing world, I was super nervous when I decided to get a Brazilian wax done. I saw Lindsey and I have stuck with her ever since. She is awesome! She made me feel super welcome and kept me laughing and distracted the whole time. She talked me through each step and was patient with me and she made sure I was happy with the result before she was done. If you want to see someone who can make you laugh your anxiety away and feel as comfortable as possible then I highly recommend seeing Lindsey!

name: Alexis Green
text: I was excited to get my eyebrows done here because my mom had been talking about how good they did hers and how painless it was. But my experience here completely differed. When I was getting my eyebrows waxed, I suffered through like 10 minutes of painful plucking after getting them already waxed for them to barely look different from before hand. There were little places where you could tell more hair was pulled. I personally was just not satisfied and have gotten better eyebrow waxing from nail salons for 15 dollars. I geuss the experience all depends on the person who does it.

name: Deaunqua Bryant
text: I have used many European Wax Center locations and I can honestly say that the staff her is unparalleled. My esthetician Etoria did an amazing job and kept me as clean as possible as painless as possible and Cassandra made check in and check out super simple.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review about your recent experience with us! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Michael
text: Walked in with my fiancée at 5pm today (Saturday) thinking they closed at 6. There wasn't anyone at the front desk so we took a seat - some people were in the back and noticed us but didn't say anything to us. Then I guess the front desk girl got back with some ice cream or something and that's when we found out they only take appointments(?) and even though they're still open for an hour and everyone is just chilling in the back talking there's just absolutely no way possible to fit us in for anything. It would have been understandable if she wasn't basically laughing at us for asking.

name: Tracey Gamble
text: Lindsey was super awesome and made me feel very comfortable during her service. I was literally scared out of my mind because it was my first time and just knew the pain was going to be intense. For the very first time it wasn't bad at all. Glad I got it done.

name: Berry Lafontaine
text: I had been looking around for a place to get a Brazilian done. I heard of this place on the radio and figured I'd give it a shot. The place was clean, people were nice. I was scared of showing my girly bits to a stranger but Adrian was very professional and made me feel not so very self conscious. I will be going here again.

name: Chandler Crane
text: I scheduled for two services to be done at 4:30 PM. After calling to confirm and make sure I had my appointment time right, I drove ONE HOUR AND FOURTY FIVE MINUTES because I loved this business. When I arrive at the opposite end of highway 280, I'm informed they will not be able to accommodate both services, but I could reschedule and come back. No one called to tell me that I was coming to an appointment that was going to be cut short or cancelled. When I called three hours before, no one took the opportunity to say "we're a little backed up," or I wouldn't have driven so far, especially in HWY 280 traffic. This whole experience has been terrible. I'll not ever go back or rep your services.

text:
Let me start off by saying...I wish the location was more convenient instead of 6 miles down 280 🙄
However, this is by far the Best waxing facility in Birmingham & Hoover!!! Clean, modern, national franchise (brazilian wax by Marci comes out of a crockpot for gods sake)
Ask for BROOKE!! She's professioanl, precise, and personable! She even takes the time to tweeze those stubborn hairs that didn't cooperate with wax!!

name: Nadia Al-Kahlout
text: I’ve worked here as a guest service associate and have tried every waxer up until I left. The only reason I keep coming back is because of Adrian. She is by far the best waxer. She makes sure that it’s as painless as possible, she follows every step necessary to ensure sanitation is correct and that you leave with flawless skin. I can’t stress how much of an amazing waxer she is. I may not get the discount I once did while working there, but honestly I don’t care. She makes sure that my money is well spent. Amazing eyebrows and Brazilian. And she will give you helpful tips on how to ensure that your waxing experience is amazing. I suggest making an appointment with her. You won’t regret it.

text: I got my first Brazilian wax here months ago and I’ve been hooked every since. I recommend booking Adrian she always makes me feel comfortable and she does a great job!

name: Katherine Armstrong
text:
I went in yesterday for a Brazillian wax. I've had many before at EWC, so I knew the kind of pain that I was in store for. I have sensitive skin and a low pain tolerance, so as always, I was very nervous.

However, yesterday's session was by far the best wax I've ever had. It was all thanks to the wax specialist, Lindsey.

She was the kindest, most encouraging woman I've ever had at EWC. Not only was she fast and did an excellent job, she made sure I was comfortable the entire time. She constantly asked, "Are you okay?" and said, "I'm so proud of you, you're doing so well!"

To say I was happy with the service is a complete understatement. I will definitely be asking for Lindsey every time I go to EWC, whether it's in Tuscaloosa or Birmingham.

Thank you, Lindsey!

name: Gabrielle Griffith
text: I was on a family vacation and had to refill a medication I forgot at home. After ringing up I was informed that a prescription had raised from a $0 co-pay to $100. This came as a big shock and my mind was wheeling with trying to figure out how to afford that each month. The staff at the pharmacy informed me to call my insurance and make sure something was not incorrect and were very patient while I did so. This was all happening at the end of their shift. The new co-pay was the correct amount and luckily my family was able to help cover the cost. Fast forward to a few days later and I received a phone call from Walgreens patient care. The pharmacy staff had contacted them on my behalf to enroll me in to a co-pay assistance program through the medication manufacture. The new total monthly cost would be $20! They also applied the discount to the original refill and I was able to give my family back the money I had borrowed to cover the medication. I am truly thankful to the staff at the Fort Payne, AL location for all the help and kindness they showed an out-of-towner. Walgreens will always have my business.

name: Maygan Page
text: Jessica is the absolute best!! After spending years going to different salons getting mediocre results I tried this one out and I haven’t been disappointed yet with my results. I have had some not so great experiences with the ladies at the front counter but I think that stems from my very first visit with them not setting clear expectations. In the beginning I was told that walk ins are welcomed but appointments are recommended. The 2 times I have had to do a walk in I’ve been turned down. Today I had a 11 o’clock appointment and came in at 9 hoping to get in early because I had to go out of town. I was willing to wait and it was a quick wax (less than 10 mins)  so I was disappointed to hear that it wasn’t possible when I come every 2 weeks at minimal. So I canceled my appointment I had for 11. After thinking it over Jessica is the reason I decided to come back. I would really like to get the wax passes which saves alot of money but I’m afraid how the customer service will be after purchasing. I don’t want to feel like I’m stuck if I decided to take my business elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi there. We’re very sorry for your experience. Please send us the details on what happened guestservices@waxcenter.com if you would like to be contacted further about your experience.

text:
Let me start off by saying that I was extremely happy when I found out that EWC was coming to Madison! I moved from PA a year ago and was sad when I found out it wasn’t here initially.
I’m a stickler on customer service and let me tell you that these ladies did not disappoint!!!!
Miya is a doll! She was so pleasant and professional and I could hear her smile in her voice. She explained the wax passes thoroughly and made sure I got the best deal. She greeted me as soon as I walked thru the door which is also a big plus for me. She checked me in quickly and before I could even sit down, Hailey was calling my name to come back (talk about being on time!!!!) This was the quickest and most thorough wax I’ve had since moving here a year ago! In that short amount of time, we talked about everything under the sun, and I felt like I had been knowing her for years. She is officially my new waxer! I’m already booked for my next appointment and I will be sure to send other customers your way! Thank you ladies!!!

text: I strongly advise making sure you know who you are booking with. I saw Ckim’s ig. Loved her work and made the call. The person on the phone said yea we put you down in the books. My style of choice was a sleek ponytail. I paid $88 for a beautiful bundle of Barbie curl and $50 for the style. I told her before leaving that I felt insecure and asked her if she could spray more holding spray on the style. She sprayed a tiny bit more. However, the style didn’t last a week. I did tie it down everyday. Didn’t exercise. The ponytail broke in half after 3 days and the swoop moved everyday. The stylist Kierra put glue all over the bundle so, I can’t reuse it. Basically money gone down the drain. Chanelle is very kind and professional. From what I saw she makes sure her clients are satisfied before leaving. Just make sure that when you call, you are booking with Ckim (Chanelle) and not accepting any other stylist.

text: In early December I purchased the Fenty foundation from this location and when I used it later on it was much too light. When I went to the store and scanned my card, the only thing that came up was a completely DIFFERENT foundation that I have never even owed. This Fenty foundation was the first thing I have purchased from this location in years so I knew for a fact that I didn’t buy it and just forgot. It also showed that I “bought” this right around the time when I actually got the Fenty foundation. The cashier rang up the wrong item when she checked it out now I am unable to make any returns or exchanges with this item and was basically told there’s nothing they could do because it’s not the product that’s on the receipt. Now I’m stuck with a 40 dollar foundation that I cannot wear because the cashier made a mistake.

text: I was very unhappy and put off on my visit to Sephora located at JC Penney in Prattville, Alabama. I had to return a foundation powder by KatVonDee due to the change of formulating. You could tell the employee did not want to deal with it. I was disappointed that it had changed and only wanted as close to the same shade as possible. Her response most of the time was she did not know what to tell me, there was nothing she could do, didn't know what I wanted her to do. I finally asked if there was a comparable brand, she did bring some from 1 other collection but it was not the same coverage. My daughter finally suggested swatching my old one (which I had with me, although broken) on my wrist and then the new KatVonDee's to see which was the closest. That worked and I made the exchange. Due to the way she nearly rolled her eyes out loud, her complete lack of caring, and making me feel less because I don't wear a lot of makeup, I will be quicker to use Walmart from now on.

text: This is my Walgreens. :)  I shop here for everything as I love to coupon shop and get the best deal for my buck. The only thing I do not recommend is their pharmacy. It takes too long to get your prescription. I used them for 5 years and recently switched to another pharmacy for prescriptions because when I drop off and come back 4 or 5 hours later I shouldn't have to wait again to pick up. But I use their photo processing and shop there at least 2 days a week for bargains.

name: Kati Miller
text: I couldn't find what I was looking for and had to search for assistance which would have been fine if I hadn't come across two employees who avoided eye contact and walked by me even after trying to stop them. I found two more employees who were stocking end caps and asked for help after they had finished speaking to each other about what sounded like a personal matter and one told me that they had no idea where said item was and suggested I ask the manager. She points to the person she was talking to and said that he was the manager and walked away. I approached this "manager" who was kneeling down by a shelf. He did not stop working to answer my question nor did he even look at me and advised me to ask the pharmacy what I needed. I glanced around for a second and after not seeing the pharmacy sign I asked him where it was and he responded by pointing a finger in the general direction of its location and said it was "over there in the corner." He didn't even look up from the shelf. Will never go back thanks to the poor service and lack of interest I received.

text: As a guy who is picky about how my hair is cut, it has been super hard to find someone to do it right. I feel like I tried so many different barber shops and salons hoping to find one that works. Well I found one and that was Capelli Salon. All the ladies at the salon are a great and welcoming. I’ve been going here for a few months now and it is just a great environment all around. I am glad that I found this place. I would recommend this salon to any guy ( or girl ) looking to have their hair done right you will not be disappointed!!!

Wonderful place!!
Emma did an awesome job on myself and my family members love her too!

text: Love the folks at Capelli!  Always a treat getting my hair styled by Betsy! ❤

name: Regina Gargollo
text: First time visit - I called them in the morning to see if I can get a balayage that day and they said yes. Very easy to set a same day appointment. Emma did a fantastic job! I will be coming back for sure.

name: Lisa Phillips
text: I walked in to the salon on a referral from a friend. The scariest thing it sitting down in a chair and hoping the stylist can "read your mind" and "capture the same vision" you have for your hair. She didn't know me, my personality, or what I liked or didn't like. I was nervous...what if she messed it up? What if I didn't like it? Immediately I was at ease. Everyone was so sweet and the atmosphere was very professional, clean, and calming. Not only did I get a GREAT haircut, I immediately knew I would be back for my color appointment. Another perk--no drama among the stylists! Professional yet friendly! I have even referred a friend there now and she had the same great experience. Best form of advertising is word of mouth! So glad I was referred to Capelli!

name: Amy Gable
text: I overheard a woman talking about getting her hair done here, and she looked great, so I looked it up and booked an appointment. I’ve been back 3 times and absolutely love it! They did a great job! I’ve has Kelly and Kathryn both do my hair.

name: Inmi Brandsema
text: I’ve always had great cuts and service for the past 2 years. The the salon is very flexible and I have always been able to make an same day appointment. I usually see Jerri or Julia. They are great. About a week ago, I saw someone else and I had a terrible experience. Part of it was on me since I did not specify my hair type (long and thick hair) but they also never ask. The stylist seems to be stressed about how long it was going to take to cut my hair. She did not attend to the details and how you can see every layer in my hair if you don’t cut it properly. She ran out of time before her next appointment and sent me to someone else to finish drying my hair. She never came back to check on her work. It was so choppy and uneven. I was so upset about my service. I went to a different salon to get it fixed. Sadly, I will not be returning to Capelli.

name: Bernadette Fraser
text: Very professional & nice personnel, always helpful with good advises, I love the way how beautiful and tidy the rooms are. You will feel very well treated (spoiled) after a visit. 100% recommend

name: Debbie Faris
text: I brought my sister here in July 2016.  I requested a cut/style and highlights and my sister got just a cut and style.  I showed my stylist (Julia) a photo of what I wanted prior to her starting.   When we were finished my hair looked nothing like the cut or highlights I requested.  My sister was very unhappy with her cut also (Katherine did hers).  Both of us had very chopped up cuts which were not the same from one side to the other.  We had negative comments from both friends and strangers who saw our hair later.  Neither of us could style our hair to make it look presentable.  I ended up cutting my own hair and my sisters to clean up the mess.  We were then able to style our hair better and got approval from friends and family.  For me this was the worst professional cut I ever got.

The staff there are racist, uneducated, shallow & care nothing about the community- just money! Go anywhere else! Their prices are as big of a joke as their politricks. Imagine flaking on a cancer organization- patients eager to see pictures, eager to read posts, but denied over Capelli’s interest in money.

name: Keith W
text: If you care anything about your health, finances and sanity you will find another pharmacy. Please do not give Walgreens your business. I have had so many bad experiences with this particular location. For example:  a stolen debit card, incorrect quantities of prescriptions (supposed to receive 60 pills in a bottle, but only 45 were in there.) They charged my insurance company for triple the quantity of another prescription. Dishonesty, rudeness, and incompetence pretty much sums up Walgreen's Pharmacies. From what I hear every location in the Montgomery area is like this. Run!!

name: Constance Burke
text: Friendly staff with a surprisingly wide options of goods and services. Pharmacy can be slow so pick slow traffic hours if possible.

name: DeAnna Sexton
text: The drive thru is terrible. 30 minute wait with one car ahead. Everytime!!!!

name: Ashley Warren
text: I have been in the drive thru for twenty-seven minutes. This pharmacy has an incredibly S-L-O-W drive thru. I may expire here. (Now twenty-eight minutes.)

name: Debbie Hernandez
text: I placed an order online for curbside pickup for only TWO items. I have been waiting and currently still waiting on my order. I will never place an order online again. I only did this for two items that were gifts to a child for their birthday. They are extremely slow at this location.

name: Bee Bee
text: Normally this location is average for pharmacy waits and competency but they keep changing the hours. It used to be a 24 hr pharmacy, then it changed to 7am-11pm, covid hit and it went to 9am-9pm, about 2 weeks ago it was 7am-11pm again, and now it's back to 9am-9pm... I wish they would go back to 24 hr but I'd settle on 7-11 as I prefer early morning or late evening pick ups as I live 30 minutes away and don't like dealing with loads of traffic to get to town...

name: Scott Braswell
text: Awesome women working the pharmacy they are fast & friendly and usually will put a smile on your face. I highly recommend shopping here!!!

name: Charlar Barnes
text: The staff at the photo area was extremely unprofessional. The staff was rude and provided poor customer service. I decided to take my business to another store.

name: Crystal Reynolds
text: This is the slowest pharmacy I've ever been to in my life! I spent more time waiting inside on my prescription than I did in the emergency room. They never seemed to be adequately staffed for the volume at this location. Them being 24 hrs is the only advantage. I'll be filling my prescriptions elsewhere from now on.

name: M Jackson
text: The Pharmacy wait is extremely too long and the staff don't recognize the people at the window because the always short staff.. the window wait is way too long and this is at night . Understanding that they are tired and ready to go home

name: Viridiana Zambrano
text: Worst Pharmacy, Ghetto came two days in a row to pick up my medication didn't have it ready then have the nerve to get a attitude. Not coming back.

name: Alexis Parker
text: The blonde girl that works there was awesome 👏🏻 she really helped me & was fast!

name: Tim Babb
text: Pharmacy tech was to lazy to go check to see if they had what I needed in stock. She took my script and said they should have it and that it would be an hour and a half wait. An hour and a half later I come back and I’m informed that it wasn’t in stock.

name: Jessica Palmer
text: Terrible customer service. No one else is waiting yet I’m here for 45 minutes with a sick child.

name: Sherwanda Foster
text: I didn't go in with my daughter for this transaction but the staff must be efficient and on point. My very particular daughter went in to make a return and was immediately back to the car with no qualms which is rare for her.  The parking lot was buzzing at the time.

name: Brick Pappi
text: Dropped off prescription at 6 pm and I left without my prescription at 11:10 pm. These people at Walgreens Pharmacy on brown springs road are the most ignorant people ever. Why are the standards so low for pharmacist , techs , and other positions within the pharmacy ? They feel completely comfortable being disrespectful to customers because management doesn’t hold employees accountable at Walgreens.  If I could give negative stars I would give a negative -20. WALGREENS IS AND WILL ALWAYS WILL BE THE PHARMACY THAT EMPLOYS THE MOST IGNORANT OF PEOPLE. THIS REVIEW IS ONLY THE FIRST STEP.

name: Maya Smith (MayaPapaya)
text: This location overall is probably at a B- rating. It's mainly because of the pharmacy. They are extremely slow and don't have medications in stock. They also aren't helpful when it comes to verifying the prescriptions with your doctor's offices or insurances. They send you to do the foot work. I went just last night to fill a prescription for my 11 yr old who had surgery that day. He had to have his elbow reset and a pin put in it. I was told it would take 20 mins tops to get his pain medication. I spent over an hour there with him in pain along with my other 2 children who are 6 yrs old. Came to the pharmacy at a quarter to 10p, left there at 5 mins to 11p! The few times I have to get medications from there, I always have to deal with an issue, whether it be insurance issues, the medications aren't there, they need the doctor to verify, they can't see or find something in the system, etc. Just always something! SMH, if they worked on the pharmacy, it'd be an A+ store.

name: Madison Monte
text: I had an excellent experience here. It was timely and well executed. The pharmacist was simply kind and answered my questions accurately.

name: Sonya Briggs
text: ZERO STARS...Terrible pharmacy experience and this is the last time I use this Walgreens pharmacy. Lady was so very rude. My meds were emailed to pharmacy by 11 am and it is 7:30 pm and I still do not have them.

text: Drive through service nearly non existent.

text: The employees are very helpful. However, I now use Adam's Drugs! Much better. 😀

name: Amanda Cook
text: TERRIBLE service at the pharmacy. We tried to use their location because our child had an issue after regular hours on a Sunday and our regular pharmacy was closed. There was a blonde at the drive thru window with a tattoo on her arm who had a TERRIBLE attitude. She tried to make us go inside to present our prescription (after waiting in the drive-thru for 20 minutes) and we explained to her that we were dropping off, she said it would be 2 hours wait for a simple common antibiotic (no mixing - just pills). We left the prescription and told them we'd just have to come back the next day, it was late and the kids needed to get to bed. I understand they were busy, but when we arrived back the next day they had NO RECORD of our child in the system, they had lost the physical prescription I handed to her the night before, and they pretended like we were the crazy ones and nothing was wrong. We had to call the Drs office and get them to send the Rx to our regular pharmacy. Thank goodness our child had an antibiotic shot at the Drs office that was already working or I really would have been put out. If I could give zero stars, I would.

name: Jasper Riax
text: I've waited 45 minutes for one prescription I filled 3 hours ago. They've told me to pull around TWICE because the pharmacist has to "check it" this is the worst pharmacy I've ever been to.

name: Michelle S
text:
Give me a break
Call - Is my RX ready for pickup
Walgreens- yes
Get to drive thru
27 minutes later.....
Can I help you....

If this is your standard. Close your drive thru. Your service is abysmal.

name: Katie Grimes Rotton
text: It would be nice if there an actual phone number that would make it easier to call instead of looking through several sites to get a real (LOCAL) phone number with a real person.  Just remember, every time a business uses automatic phone menus and online applications, someone loses their job, money for school, their insurance (health and life), and probably their house.

name: UnbiasedReport
text: No reason why I should be up so late, but I am to do this review. Customer service in the pharmacy is non existent. At 11:10 PM I turned in my prescription, was not met with kindness, and treated even worse when I told the pharmacist that I did not have health insurance. She told me it would be about 15 to 20 minutes before my prescription was ready. I asked her where did I need to go or did I need to just come back? She said well you can't sit here. You can drive over there and wait. I did so and in turn while I was waiting fell asleep. I just happened to wake up and looked at my clock and it read Midnight. I was literally across from the window. I proceeded to call and find out what was the hold up with my prescription because I did not receive a text message alert stating that it was ready. The automated system told me that I had a prescription ready.  upset at this point I went to the window and I told the lady that no one told me my prescription was ready. In turn she told me that the girl tried to wave me down. I was directly across from the window asleep in the car or as far as she could have assumed was dead from just sitting there. She had no concern at all. They have my number on file and did not use it. Nor was I sent a text message letting me know that my prescription was ready. She the pharmacist then asked if I wanted instructions instead of volunteering the instructions. I did not answer from being so upset that my time was wasted. I will not be going back. I will let others know that this Pharmacy is at the corner of rude and rude.

name: Kids' Videos
text: Good products but their prices are very high. You can get the same over the counter products cheaper at walmart or Amazon. They are always crowded and extremely slow at filling the prescriptions.

text: I called to ask a question of the pharmacy staff, and I waited 28 minutes before they answered my call. I have also been in the store before and seen first hand that they ignored the ringing phones. I will be using a independent pharmacy from now on!

I came back because I had forgot something, and I noticed the cashier asked this white female for a donation (She did donate, I think), and when she left I went through the line... And she didn't ask me; she wasn't saying anything, but she said a lot with that action #100 Get your workers together George (Or is it Georgie)

name: Vegans Rock
text:
We ARE now beginning the process of seeking a more formal resolutions.....however-- THIS Atlanta Hwy, Montgomery AL pharmacy staff INCLUDING THE PHARMACY MANAGER- JOE S. have single-handedly created the worst customer service experience of our lifetime.  We honestly advise no one with additional options to patronize with this store if your goal is to seek even a mediocre level of professionalism.
- from dispensing the incorrect patient's medications
- EXTREMELY rude staff pharmacist and pharmacist managers
- omitting the correct medications
- charging customers for the incorrect medications

TRY AN ALTERNATE PUBLIX PHARMACY  (or Rite-Aide deliver)

if all else fells, become a chemist and mix your own drug therapy because NO ONE should PAY a retail store to be treated with hostility

name: Tawny Wyatt
text: This place is very good at consistency... they are very consistently horrible. I hate to even give them ONE star. Every prescription we've ever had to get filled here is always late- like over an hour when your doctor has called it in the day before, OR they click on their keyboard and tell you that they have received nothing from your doctor, when you know that they have. We have also had them call us to tell us that a prescription was ready, only to get there, and they tell us that it is backordered and out of stock. The techs are extremely rude- I've witnessed eye-rolls and dramatic sighs (not just at myself but also other patients), and they don't seem to be very efficient at their jobs. The ONLY reason we EVER use this place is because they are the only 24-hour pharmacy in the area. If it weren't for that, we would never ever return our business here.

name: K
text: I have been using this pharmacy for several years. I have had just a few minor negative experiences during this time. Most of the time I was comfortable with the service. Today was a different story. I called about an hour before they closed to finalize 2 scrip. orders. I called at this time because I had tried several times in the past week and today to get thru to someone on the phone, but had too long of a hold time each time. I thought it might be less busy at 7pm. The woman who answered, who I believe was the pharmacist on duty, had a disrespectful tone a couple of times during the call. I mentally excused her then drove to pick up my orders almost immediately. When I arrived the assistant, who was one of the distasteful encounters I've witnessed in the past, was working the drive thru. I told her I needed the pills cut in the required dose which I'd gotten done many times before without problems. It usually doesn't take very long to do as well. I went to wait across the lot when I saw a multitude of cars arriving at the drive thru right before closing time. 15 or so minutes had elapsed and it was closing time by that time so I decided to drive back over to the window to pick up my meds. When I arrived the tech ignored me for about a minute or 2 and then she mouthed something to me without the microphone and immediately walked away out of my sight. I could not make out what she said, of course. I continued to wait patiently. Within that time the pharmacist walked over and in a scolding tone told me to tell her ahead of time I needed them cut. I informed her I did not because I was informed in the past not to do that because I must pay for them before they are cut. She then continued her scolding by telling me "Well it's just so late." Omg...are you not still open for business when I arrived 15 to 20 minutes prior? And it doesn't take that long to cut them. And I would of done it sooner if I could of gotten someone on the telephone without a long hold time every time I called! That response was rude, unprofessional and unfair and I did nothing wrong. How dare her and that tech or whatever she is treat a good customer this way. I have always been fair and courteous to the staff. I have already found another pharmacy and will pull my business out of there tomorrow. Thanks for reading) Hope this helps!

name: matthew Mccullough
text:
Everytime I use the automatic phone serrvice to order refills, there is always a problem and at least one isn't filled and I have to wait for them to fill it or have to come back!!! On Wednesday August 24, 2017, I called automatic phone service to order my desvenlafaxine and the recording said "we recently tried to call you to see if you wanted your armodafinil  its due to be refilled" I said yes, so it was to be ready after 11am that day. I got to the pharmacy and they said that I didn't have anything!!! I told her what I had ordered so she said I'll get it fixed, it will take a few minutes! When it was ready, she said she only had part of meds in stock and would have to order it!!!! I took the partial prescriptions and left. Thursday I called and asked were the meds in and the lady said yes. I got there and only one was available. When I questioned her about the other medication she said it didn't come in. That night I called and spoke with a lady and asked her what time my meds would be there, cause I was going to Florida at 9am the following medicine, she said it would be after 10am. I told her I was leaving to go to Florida at 9am the next day. I then asked "why is it taking so long after you ordered it to come in? She said it's because it's a narcotic. So I went on to Florida. Now I had already received 5 pills, and you would think that they would have been on the look out for it!!!!!! so when I got home Monday I went to Walgreens to pick up meds, GUESS WHAT?????? NO MEDS!!!!!!!!! She had not explanation on invoice of why meds did not come in!!!!! And now I'm being told it will be in tomorrow.....we'll see!!!!!!!
Update: I called to check to see if my medicine came in and the lady said no it still hasn't come in!!!!!! She said I'm going to give it one more day...I interrupted her and said tomorrow makes a week since you first ordered it and she said "it's because it's a narcotic (?)!!!!! I'm not a dummy, I don't know what they are doing but I will be changing pharmacies!!!!!!!

There was no one minding the drive-through at all, & no one really cared. Where was the store mgr?  Where was the pharmacy staff. I'd rather drive farther and receive this kind of AMAZING customer service than close to home with none! You've got GEMS at this location!!!

name: Dru Martinez
text: I love the people who work in the pharmacy. I have used the pharmacy for about two years now and they are always professional and friendly. I took my 12 year old (who hates injections) to get her flu shot and the pharmacist was so kind, taking time to make sure that she felt comfortable. This season my daughter suggested that it was time for us to go to Walgreens and get our flu shots! Time after time they treat you like you are their most important customer!

text: Slowly loosing faith. Calling up here to take care of any issues? Completely impossible I can never talk to anyone. I understand being short staffed and I don’t mind waiting but I always get hung up on. Needed a prescription for a sick child requested quicker pick up because we absolutely couldn’t want. Waited paid the quoted time and still got told an hour and half wait time… pharmacist came over and told me it would be just a minute but I had to wait in the line again with a screaming child. Because going home without this isn’t an option. So have officially spent over an hour waiting. Please just don’t lie. Be honest.
